text: @realDonaldTrump @horror06 Mr @realDonaldTrump why don't you mind yr own business & let @narendramodi , elected by 600 million deal with #China. U r totally insconsistent: u keep attacking China on #coronavirus or trade, but u do not prop up Indian, which is only country that can counter Chinese hegemony
